sources.title: The Three Bears (1939)
sources.description: A singing, jitterbugging Goldilocks goes through her paces with the grizzly trio, but when a bear hunter gets into the house, she joins with them to fight and eventually tie him up. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-three-bears-1939/

metadata.Plot: A singing, jitterbugging Goldilocks goes through her paces with an Italian grizzly trio, but when a bear hunter gets into the house, she joins with them to fight and eventually tie him up.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Donald McKee, Tom Morrison
